mapper.insert: insert into item (item_code, i_category, item_name, i_img, i_detail, i_stock, i_price, i_sale, i_tax_free) values (#{item_code}, #{i_category}, #{item_name}, #{i_img}, #{i_detail}, #{i_stock}, #{i_price}, #{i_sale}, #{i_tax_free})
mapper.select: select item_num, item_code, i_category, item_name, i_img, i_regdate, i_updatedate, i_detail, i_stock, i_price, i_sale, i_delete, i_tax_free from item where item_num = #{itemNum}
mapper.update: update item set item_code = #{item_code}, i_category = #{i_category}, item_name= #{item_name}, i_img = #{i_img}, i_detail = #{i_detail}, i_stock = #{i_stock}, i_price = #{i_price}, i_sale = #{i_sale}, i_delete = #{i_delete}, i_tax_free = #{i_tax_free}, i_updatedate = now() where item_num = #{itemNum}
